doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 10 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 127[Air Date: 12/3/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 10 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 127[Air Date: 12/3/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. "Black and White Men Together" members Lidell Jackson and Mitchell Karp discuss racial discrimination at the Ice PalaceCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp2. National Gay Task Force, interviews with members Peter Fowler and Evelyn WhiteCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"COMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper3. Interview with Keith O'Connor, NYC Human Rights Commission, discussing anti-gay discrimination bill in NYCCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janiero, The Islanders Club4. Report on Executive Order 50; employment rights for city contractorsCOMMERCIAL: New York Gay Film Festival5. U.S. Court of Appeals for District of Columbia refused to hear case of expelled gay navy officer6. Community announcementsCOMMERCIAL: Arco Blancos resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico7. Heathline: Conversations with GMHC: Topic: AIDS Assessment Program of Community Health Project. Interview with Dr. Ted Lazarus, clinical coordinator AIDS Assessment Program, and Rona Affoumado, Admin. Director, Community Health ProjectCOMMERCIAL: Badlands, NYC gay bar8. Sports report
The Right Stuff:1. Current EventsCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"COMMERCIAL: World of Video2. Interview with Gary Miller, music director of the NYC Gay Men's Chorus, includes footage of chorus performing at Christopher Street Liberation Day Parade 1984COMMERCIAL: New York Gay and Lesbian Film FestivalCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity: gay and lesbian disabled4. Interview with Quentin Crisp
